examples.full_description: Concerns::Findable defines a module named Concerns::Findable

examples.description: is added as a class method to classes that extend the module
examples.full_description: Concerns::Findable .find_by_name is added as a class method to classes that extend the module

examples.description: searching the extended class's @@all variable for an instance that matches the provided name
examples.full_description: Concerns::Findable .find_by_name works exactly like a generic version of Song.find_by_name, searching the extended class's @@all variable for an instance that matches the provided name

examples.description: is added as a class method to classes that extend the module
examples.full_description: Concerns::Findable .find_or_create_by_name is added as a class method to classes that extend the module

examples.description: finds (does not recreate) an existing instance with the provided name if one exists in @@all
examples.full_description: Concerns::Findable .find_or_create_by_name works exactly like a generic version of Song.find_or_create_by_name: finds (does not recreate) an existing instance with the provided name if one exists in @@all
Concerns::Findable .find_or_create_by_name works exactly like a generic version of Song.find_or_create_by_name: isn't hard-coded

examples.description: invokes .find_by_name instead of re-coding the same functionality
examples.full_description: Concerns::Findable .find_or_create_by_name works exactly like a generic version of Song.find_or_create_by_name: invokes .find_by_name instead of re-coding the same functionality

examples.description: invokes the extended class's .create method, passing in the provided name, if an existing match is not found
examples.full_description: Concerns::Findable .find_or_create_by_name works exactly like a generic version of Song.find_or_create_by_name: invokes the extended class's .create method, passing in the provided name, if an existing match is not found
